pages.text: Ares potion, it gives a very strong buff that mixes potion of the turtle master, strength 2 and speed as well as regen to give you a strong buff, however, this potion takes half your health due to you not being a god, Ares was strong but you have to thing like Athena and use strategy for this to work.
To craft this potion brew a golden apple into a potion of the turtle master.
